description.oldValue:
We’ll add a guide to the Advanced deployment guides page that will help you implement the Zero Trust security strategy. This strategy recommends that you verify explicitly, use least privilege access, and assume breach. You’ll use Zero Trust to help secure identities, endpoints, data, apps, infrastructure, and networks.
GA date: November CY2022
description.newValue: We’ll add a guide to the Advanced deployment guides page that will help you implement the Zero Trust security strategy. This strategy recommends that you verify explicitly, use least privilege access, and assume breach. You’ll use Zero Trust to help secure identities, endpoints, data, apps, infrastructure, and networks.
